hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# Preparing tmp=/tmp/jenkins/${JOB_NAME} mkdir -p $tmp
# ENV URL=https://eu0.cdn.subut.ai:8338/kurjun/rest filename="management-${GIT_BRANCH##origin/}.deb"
# get current file id function jsonval { temp=`echo $json | sed 's/\\\\\//\//g' | sed 's/[{}]//g' | awk -v k="text" '{n=split($0,a,","); for (i=1; i<=n; i++) print a[i]}' | sed 's/\"\:\"/\|/g' | sed 's/[\,]/ /g' | sed 's/\"//g' | grep -w $prop` echo ${temp##*|} }
json=`curl -k -s -X GET $URL/apt/info?name=$filename` prop='md5Sum' id=`jsonval`
cd management
# build deb mvn clean install -Dmaven.test.skip=true -P deb -Dgit.branch=${GIT_BRANCH##origin/}
# move builded file #mv `ls server/server-karaf/target/*.deb` $tmp/$filename find server/server-karaf/target/ -name "*.deb" | xargs -I {} mv {} $tmp/$filename
#preparing data for uploader echo "file=$tmp/$filename" > ../env.properties echo "id=$id" >> ../env.properties echo "dir=apt" >> ../env.properties

URL=https://eu0.cdn.subut.ai:8338/kurjun/rest USER=jenkins AUTHID=$(curl -s -k "$URL/auth/token?user=$USER" | gpg --clearsign --no-tty) token=$(curl -s -k -Fmessage="$AUTHID" -Fuser=$USER "$URL/auth/token")
curl -s -k -Ffile=@$file -Ftoken=$token "$URL/$dir/upload"
# delete old file curl -s -k -X DELETE "$URL/apt/delete?id=$id&token=$token"

# Preparing tmp=/tmp/jenkins/${JOB_NAME} mkdir -p $tmp
# ENV URL=https://eu0.cdn.subut.ai:8338/kurjun/rest filename="management-subutai-template_4.0.0-${GIT_BRANCH##origin/}_amd64.tar.gz"
# get current file id function jsonval { temp=`echo $json | sed 's/\\\\\//\//g' | sed 's/[{}]//g' | awk -v k="text" '{n=split($0,a,","); for (i=1; i<=n; i++) print a[i]}' | sed 's/\"\:\"/\|/g' | sed 's/[\,]/ /g' | sed 's/\"//g' | grep -w $prop` echo ${temp##*|} }
json=`curl -k -s -X GET $URL/template/info?name=$filename` prop='md5Sum' id=`jsonval`
# build template ssh root@gw.intra.lan "/apps/bin/subutai destroy management" #ssh root@gw.intra.lan "/bin/rm /mnt/lib/lxc/tmpdir/management-subutai-template*" ssh root@gw.intra.lan "/apps/bin/subutai clone openjre8 management" sleep 5 ssh root@gw.intra.lan "/apps/bin/lxc-attach -n management -- apt update" ssh root@gw.intra.lan "/apps/bin/lxc-attach -n management -- sync" ssh root@gw.intra.lan "/apps/bin/lxc-attach -n management -- apt -y --force-yes install management-${GIT_BRANCH##origin/}" ssh root@gw.intra.lan "/apps/bin/subutai export management -v 4.0.0-${GIT_BRANCH##origin/}"
# move template to jenkins instance ssh root@gw.intra.lan "mv /mnt/lib/lxc/tmpdir/management-subutai-template_4.0.0-${GIT_BRANCH##origin/}_amd64.tar.gz /mnt/lib/lxc/jenkins/rootfs/$tmp/$filename"
#preparing data for uploader echo "file=$tmp/$filename" > env.properties echo "id=$id" >> env.properties echo "dir=template" >> env.properties

URL=https://eu0.cdn.subut.ai:8338/kurjun/rest USER=jenkins AUTHID=$(curl -s -k "$URL/auth/token?user=$USER" | gpg --clearsign --no-tty) token=$(curl -s -k -Fmessage="$AUTHID" -Fuser=$USER "$URL/auth/token")
curl -s -k -Ffile=@$file -Ftoken=$token "$URL/$dir/upload"
# delete old file curl -s -k -X DELETE "$URL/template/delete?id=$id&token=$token"
